prettier.notification.could-not-load-pre: Please ensure your Node.js installation is up to date. Additionally, check if the 'Prettier module' path is correctly set in your extension or project settings. For more details, refer to the error log in the Extension Console
prettier.notification.stopped-running.bo: If this problem persists, please report the issue through the Extension Library.
prettier.notification.missingParser.body: Prettier doesn’t include a parser for this file, and no installed plugin provides one.
prettier.notification.config.updated.bod: Your project’s Prettier configuration has been updated to the new config format.
prettier.notification.formatSelection.re: Prettier⁺ notification restored. “Format Selection” will now reappear in the menu for unsupported syntaxes, showing a warning when used.
prettier.notification.prettier-not-found: Prettier couldn’t be found because npm isn’t available. Please make sure you have Node installed. If you’ve only installed Node through NVM, you’ll need to change your shell configuration to work with Nova. See https://library.panic.com/nova/environment-variables/
prettier.notification.prettier-start-fai: Please check the extension console for additional logs.
“Format Selection” isn’t available for this file type. Supported syntaxes: JavaScript, TypeScript, GraphQL, and Handlebars.

Clicking “Dismiss” will disable the command for unsupported syntaxes.
prettier.notification.format-error.title: Error while formatting
